    • cashierAddOrder

      @PostMapping("/orders/cashieradd") public Orders cashierAddOrder(@RequestParam(required=false) String email, @RequestParam(required=false) String firstName, @RequestParam(required=false) String lastName, @RequestBody Map<String,Object> orderData) throws URISyntaxException, IOException, InterruptedException
      API Route for cashier to add an order. Either both first name and last name are passed, or only the user's email
      Parameters:
      email - Optional user's email
      firstName - Optional user's first name
      lastName - Optional user's last name
      orderData - JSON Object containing full order data
      Returns:
      JSON Object with the order's body
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException
      IOException
      InterruptedException

      Returns:

    • updateProduct

      @PostMapping("/menu/update") public Product updateProduct(@RequestParam Integer productID, @RequestParam(required=false) String newName, @RequestParam(required=false) String category, @RequestParam(required=false) Double price, @RequestParam(required=false) String weather, @RequestParam(required=false) String url)
      Updates a current product in the database
      Parameters:
      productID - product_id from the database
      newName - Optional new name to assign to the product in the database
      category - Optional new category to assign to the product in the database
      price - Optional new price to assign to the product in the database
      weather - Optional new weather match to assign to the product in the database
      url - Optional new image URL to assign to the product in the database
      Returns:
      JSON object containing the product's updated body

    • addProduct

      @PostMapping("/menu/add") public void addProduct(@RequestParam String name, @RequestParam String category, @RequestParam Double price, @RequestParam(required=false) String weather)
      Adds a new product to the database
      Parameters:
      name - Name to assign to the new product
      category - Category to assign to the new product
      price - Price to assign to the new product
      weather - Optional weather match to assign to the new product

    • deleteProduct

      @PostMapping("/menu/delete") public void deleteProduct(@RequestParam String productName)
      Deletes / deactivates a product in the database
      Parameters:
      productName - name the product has in the database

    • getLowStock

      @GetMapping("/inventory/excess") public List<Map<String,Object>> getLowStock(@RequestParam String date)
      Shows which inventory items have sold less than 10% of their inventory given a start date
      Parameters:
      date - Date that denotes start of inventory usage counting
      Returns:
      JSON Object with inventory items that sold less than 10% of their stock

    • inventoryUsage

      @GetMapping("/inventory/usage") public List<Map<String,Object>> inventoryUsage(@RequestParam String startDate, @RequestParam String endDate)
      Returns amount of individual inventory used between two dates
      Parameters:
      startDate - Start date for data
      endDate - End date for data
      Returns:
      JSON Object containing all inventory names and their usage between dates

    • updateInventory

      @PostMapping("/inventory/update") public void updateInventory(@RequestParam Integer inventoryId, @RequestParam(required=false) String newName, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer quantity, @RequestParam(required=false) Boolean isTopping)
      Updates details for inventory items in the database
      Parameters:
      inventoryId - Inventory ID for item in the database
      newName - Name to assign to inventory item
      quantity - Stock quantity for item
      isTopping - Check to see if inventory item is a topping

    • addInventory

      @PostMapping("/inventory/add") public void addInventory(@RequestParam String inventoryName, @RequestParam(required=false) Integer quantity)
      Creates or re-activates inventory item in the database
      Parameters:
      inventoryName - Name for new inventory item
      quantity - Quantity to assign to new inventory item

      categoryName - Name of the category in the datbase
